example.text: HR 2 would decimate the border by: ? eliminating critical reimbursements for communities like mine ? cutting NGOs off from federal funds, and ? creating humanitarian catastrophe - by design Watch?? [[url]]
Today I was honored to meet with Dr. Rolf Mützenich, Chairman of [[user]]. It was wonderful to speak about cooperative security and coordination between our countries. [[url]]

Once again this year, I'm proud to announce over $25 million in federal funding that will help support 14 great projects going on in the community, This funding comes from Community Project Funding, and I was proud to host a press conference this month with many of the recipients.
